page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
Polo You play with a group of friends. Someone is "Up" at the top of the playground. He or she has to think of a subject. The people at the bottom of the playground have to guess what the subject is. When they guess right they have to run up and down.The first person that gets to the top is "Up".
Hopscotch You need a small group of friends and some squares drawn on the ground with numbers one to ten. You throw a stone and whatever number it lands on you have to hop over one at a time. Then you throw the stone again for the next number.
Invaders You need a group of friends. Some children are baddies (the Invaders).
